title: 3 and Out - Broncos Sale, Commanders Wentz Overpay, Jags #1 Pick, Front Office Draft Fog, QB Inflation, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Broncos Sale, Commanders Wentz Overpay, Jags #1 Pick, Front Office Draft Fog, QB Inflation, Mailbag
description:
John discusses the latest news on the sale of the Denver Broncos, why it's clear Washington gave up way too much for Carson Wentz, why Aiden Hutchinson could get passed over for the #1 pick based on Jags GM Trent Baalke's past drafts, why this time of year is when paralysis by analysis is running rampant in NFL front offices, and why this weak QB class could still get up to 5 first rounders. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
